entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

Humidity: 75 %

Wind: E 9 km/h

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
